shortDesc: Spacious family house with garden in Colombo 05.
longDesc: Luxurious 4-Bedroom Family House in Colombo 05...Welcome to this elegant four-bedroom family residence located in the highly sought-after Colombo 05 area. Built on a spacious land plot, this home offers a perfect balance of modern comfort and classic design. The property features generously sized bedrooms, well-lit living and dining areas, and a modern kitchen fitted with quality cabinetry and appliances. Large windows allow natural light to flow throughout the home, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The outdoor garden space is ideal for family gatherings, children's play, or quiet relaxation. With secure parking, a peaceful residential environment, and close proximity to schools, hospitals, and shopping centres, this property is ideal for families seeking convenience and quality living in the heart of the city.

shortDesc: Modern apartment in the heart of Kandy.
longDesc: Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment in the Heart of Kandy.... This stylish three-bedroom apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Kandy, offering breathtaking city views and easy access to essential amenities. Designed for modern urban living, the apartment features spacious bedrooms, a contemporary open-plan living and dining area, and a fully fitted kitchen with modern finishes. The interiors are thoughtfully designed to maximise comfort and functionality, while large balconies provide a relaxing space to enjoy scenic surroundings. Ideal for professionals or families, this apartment offers secure access, parking facilities, and excellent connectivity to transport, shopping, and cultural landmarks.

shortDesc: Large family home in a calm residential area.
longDesc: Spacious 5-Bedroom Family Home in a Peaceful Gampaha Neighbourhood.... This impressive five-bedroom house is ideal for large families seeking space, privacy, and comfort. Situated in a calm residential area of Gampaha, the property features expansive living areas, multiple bedrooms, and a modern kitchen designed for everyday convenience. The home includes ample storage, wide corridors, and a well-maintained backyard that provides space for outdoor activities and family gatherings. Natural ventilation and sunlight enhance the interior ambience, making the home both comfortable and energy efficient. With easy access to schools, supermarkets, and main roads, this property offers the perfect combination of suburban tranquillity and urban convenience.

shortDesc: Beachfront apartment with lagoon and ocean views.
longDesc: Elegant 2-Bedroom Beachfront Apartment in Negombo.... Experience coastal living in this beautifully designed two-bedroom apartment overlooking the Negombo lagoon. This property offers modern interiors, well-proportioned bedrooms, and a bright living area that opens to stunning waterfront views. The kitchen is compact yet functional, fitted with modern finishes suitable for everyday living. The apartment is ideal for professionals, small families, or investors looking for a holiday rental opportunity. Located close to beaches, restaurants, and shopping areas, this apartment provides a relaxed lifestyle with all essential conveniences nearby.

shortDesc: Charming hillside home with scenic mountain views.
longDesc: Charming 4-Bedroom Hillside Home in Nuwara Eliya.... Nestled in the cool and scenic hills of Nuwara Eliya, this charming four-bedroom home offers a peaceful retreat surrounded by nature. The house features spacious bedrooms, cosy living areas, and large windows that showcase stunning mountain views. Designed for comfort, the property blends traditional charm with modern functionality. A beautifully maintained garden provides the perfect setting for relaxation and outdoor enjoyment. Ideal as a holiday home or permanent residence, this property offers tranquillity, fresh air, and easy access to town amenities.

Luxury 3-Bedroom Lagoon-View Apartment in Batticaloa....This premium three-bedroom apartment offers breathtaking views of the Batticaloa Lagoon, making it a perfect choice for those seeking luxury and serenity. The apartment features spacious bedrooms, elegant living spaces, and modern interiors finished to a high standard. The open-plan design enhances natural light and ventilation, creating a calm and comfortable living environment. With secure access, parking facilities, and proximity to schools, hospitals, and shopping centres, this apartment is ideal for families or professionals looking for refined living in a scenic location.

shortDesc: Luxury coastal house with private swimming pool.
longDesc: This stunning six-bedroom coastal home offers an exceptional lifestyle just minutes away from pristine beaches in Matara. Designed for luxury living, the property features expansive bedrooms, multiple living areas, and high-quality finishes throughout. The outdoor space includes a beautifully designed entertainment area and swimming pool, ideal for hosting gatherings or relaxing with family. With modern security systems, ample parking, and easy access to coastal attractions and town facilities, this home is perfect for families or investors seeking a premium seaside property that combines elegance, comfort, and location.
